Description: On I-66 at mile marker 66.3 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 54 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. The south right center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Multi-Vehicle Crash

Description: On Rt. 611 in the County of Loudoun, in the vicinity of Colchester Rd; Rt. 730E/W (Loudoun County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north through lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
